channel.title: [PI] firemaking noclips? need help please
channel.description: once i try making a fire it shows the animation and the fire gets made but then doesnt stop doing animation. when you do it. and if you do it beside a wall it will noclip through because it moves once to the side when u make a fire. and other people cant see your fire its invisable. please help me tried everything couldnt get it to work! and if you need to see any files just say so.
